activity.title: Fiduciary Programme
activity.description: The FSFE's Fiduciary Programme allowed for projects to use the Fiduciary License Agreement (FLA) to assign copyrights to the FSFE, allowing the consolidation and effective management of their copyright status. While the FSFE no longer accepts new projects under the Fiduciary Programme, we continue to offer customisable versions of the Fiduciary License Agreement (FLA) for your use.
